4283.verse: فَاطِرُ|(The) Creator|111|117|15350$ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٲتِ|(of) the heavens|132|145|351$وَٱلْأَرْضِ‌ۚ|and the earth.|116|129|352$جَعَلَ|He made|77|90|195$لَكُم|for you|67|80|207$مِّنْ|from|50|63|53$أَنفُسِكُمْ|yourselves,|95|101|2097$أَزْوَٲجًا|mates,|88|104|2084$وَمِنَ|and among|92|125|74$ٱلْأَنْعَـٰمِ|the cattle|86|119|4475$أَزْوَٲجًا‌ۖ|mates;|88|121|2084$يَذْرَؤُكُمْ|He multiplies you|131|164|15351$فِيهِ‌ۚ|thereby.|76|92|32$لَيْسَ|(There) is not|112|120|1763$كَمِثْلِهِۦ|like Him|85|101|15352$شَىْءٌ‌ۖ|anything,|82|98|1551$وَهُوَ|and He|66|82|305$ٱلسَّمِيعُ|(is) the All-Hearer,|144|160|1170$ٱلْبَصِيرُ|the All-Seer.|104|112|10212$

4284.verse: لَهُۥ|To Him (belongs)|132|152|977$مَقَالِيدُ|(the) keys|89|130|15027$ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٲتِ|(of) the heavens|132|172|351$وَٱلْأَرْضِ‌ۖ|and the earth.|116|156|352$يَبْسُطُ|He extends|94|114|9443$ٱلرِّزْقَ|the provision|105|115|9444$لِمَن|for whom|81|102|1356$يَشَآءُ|He wills|69|90|867$وَيَقْدِرُ‌ۚ|and restricts.|109|130|9445$إِنَّهُۥ|Indeed, He|92|113|396$بِكُلِّ|of every|75|96|306$شَىْءٍ|thing|69|79|186$عَلِيمٌ|(is) All-Knower.|122|122|307$

4285.verse: ۞ شَرَعَ|He has ordained|126|135|15353$لَكُم|for you|67|84|207$مِّنَ|of|50|67|156$ٱلدِّينِ|the religion|93|110|11$مَا|what|53|70|262$وَصَّىٰ|He enjoined|97|114|15354$بِهِۦ|upon|52|69|204$نُوحًا|Nuh,|66|75|6485$وَٱلَّذِىٓ|and that which|120|126|6481$أَوْحَيْنَآ|We have revealed|139|151|4640$إِلَيْكَ|to you,|68|80|45$وَمَا|and what|82|94|46$وَصَّيْنَا|We enjoined|101|113|4528$بِهِۦٓ|upon|52|64|204$إِبْرَٲهِيمَ|Ibrahim|91|97|1127$وَمُوسَىٰ|and Musa|97|103|5792$وَعِيسَىٰٓ‌ۖ|and Isa.|95|107|1238$أَنْ|To|44|56|655$أَقِيمُواْ|establish|78|90|5729$ٱلدِّينَ|the religion|93|105|1208$وَلَا|and not|71|83|25$تَتَفَرَّقُواْ|be divided|90|102|15355$فِيهِ‌ۚ|therein.|71|77|32$كَبُرَ|Is difficult|86|94|5547$عَلَى|on|63|78|52$ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ|the polytheists|119|134|990$مَا|what|53|68|262$تَدْعُوهُمْ|you call them|109|124|7080$إِلَيْهِ‌ۚ|to it.|54|69|296$ٱللَّهُ|Allah|53|68|2323$يَجْتَبِىٓ|chooses|80|88|3545$إِلَيْهِ|for Himself|89|100|296$مَن|whom|58|80|76$يَشَآءُ|He wills,|74|96|867$وَيَهْدِىٓ|and guides|91|114|276$إِلَيْهِ|to Himself|85|108|296$مَن|whoever|76|98|76$يُنِيبُ|turns.|67|78|15099$

4286.verse: وَمَا|And not|72|90|46$تَفَرَّقُوٓاْ|they became divided|157|193|3132$إِلَّا|until|48|84|86$مِنۢ بَعْدِ|after|91|127|280$مَا|[what]|65|101|262$جَآءَهُمُ|came to them|112|130|2702$ٱلْعِلْمُ|the knowledge|116|124|2703$بَغْيَۢا|(out of) rivalry,|122|138|1862$بَيْنَهُمْ‌ۚ|among them.|106|122|1056$وَلَوْلَا|And if not|85|101|2238$كَلِمَةٌ|(for) a word|100|116|8063$سَبَقَتْ|that preceded|114|122|8064$مِن|from|50|64|53$رَّبِّكَ|your Lord|82|109|1322$إِلَىٰٓ|for|53|80|118$أَجَلٍ|a term|63|90|6760$مُّسَمًّى|specified,|83|110|5411$لَّقُضِىَ|surely, it (would have) been settled|258|272|5438$بَيْنَهُمْ‌ۚ|between them.|120|126|1056$وَإِنَّ|And indeed,|98|110|713$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|101|20$أُورِثُواْ|were made to inherit|157|169|15356$ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ|the Book|85|97|451$مِنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ|after them|116|122|2256$لَفِى|(are) surely in|113|162|1513$شَكٍّ|doubt|58|155|4619$مِّنْهُ|concerning it -|118|215|571$مُرِيبٍ|disquieting.|95|144|8582$

4287.verse: فَلِذَٲلِكَ|So to that|89|100|15357$فَٱدْعُ‌ۖ|then invite,|96|119|585$وَٱسْتَقِمْ|and stand firm|115|138|15358$كَمَآ|as|53|76|110$أُمِرْتَ‌ۖ|you are commanded|153|176|8764$وَلَا|and (do) not|104|116|25$تَتَّبِعْ|follow|58|69|5015$أَهْوَآءَهُمْ‌ۖ|their desires,|106|128|1116$وَقُلْ|but say,|75|97|2709$ءَامَنتُ|`I believe|84|106|8301$بِمَآ|in what|69|91|43$أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ|Allah has sent down|153|175|863$مِن|of|50|61|53$كِتَـٰبٍ‌ۖ|(the) Book,|95|103|3052$وَأُمِرْتُ|and I am commanded|161|176|8240$لِأَعْدِلَ|that I do justice|128|143|15359$بَيْنَكُمُ‌ۖ|between you.|111|126|5226$ٱللَّهُ|Allah|53|68|123$رَبُّنَا|(is) our Lord|101|109|1253$وَرَبُّكُمْ‌ۖ|and your Lord.|116|123|1254$لَنَآ|For us|61|74|338$أَعْمَـٰلُنَا|our deeds|86|99|1256$وَلَكُمْ|and for you|96|109|387$أَعْمَـٰلُكُمْ‌ۖ|your deeds.|98|111|1257$لَا|(There is) no|106|119|30$حُجَّةَ|argument|82|89|15360$بَيْنَنَا|between us|97|110|2964$وَبَيْنَكُمُ‌ۖ|and between you.|140|165|15361$ٱللَّهُ|Allah|53|78|123$يَجْمَعُ|will assemble|105|130|14276$بَيْنَنَا‌ۖ|[between] us,|114|139|2964$وَإِلَيْهِ|and to Him|91|104|2165$ٱلْمَصِيرُ|(is) the final return.`|159|159|1162$

4283.verse: [He is] Creator of the heavens and the earth. He has made for you from yourselves, mates, and among the cattle, mates; He multiplies you thereby. There is nothing like unto Him, and He is the Hearing, the Seeing.

4284.verse: To Him belong the keys of the heavens and the earth. He extends provision for whom He wills and restricts [it]. Indeed He is, of all things, Knowing.

4285.verse: He has ordained for you of religion what He enjoined upon Noah and that which We have revealed to you, [O Muhammad], and what We enjoined upon Abraham and Moses and Jesus - to establish the religion and not be divided therein. Difficult for those who associate others with Allah is that to which you invite them. Allah chooses for Himself whom He wills and guides to Himself whoever turns back [to Him].

4286.verse: And they did not become divided until after knowledge had come to them - out of jealous animosity between themselves. And if not for a word that preceded from your Lord [postponing the penalty] until a specified time, it would have been concluded between them. And indeed, those who were granted inheritance of the Scripture after them are, concerning it, in disquieting doubt.

4287.verse: So to that [religion of Allah] invite, [O Muhammad], and remain on a right course as you are commanded and do not follow their inclinations but say, "I have believed in what Allah has revealed of the Qur'an, and I have been commanded to do justice among you. Allah is our Lord and your Lord. For us are our deeds, and for you your deeds. There is no [need for] argument between us and you. Allah will bring us together, and to Him is the [final] destination."
